Name: 8bit Pigeon Hunter
About the game: 8BIT PIGEON HUNTER It's been only 35 years 8BIT PIGEON HUNTER is a light gun shooter video game in which ducks appear one or two at a time, and you are given three shots to shoot them down. You receive points upon shooting each duck. If you shoot the required number of ducks in a single round, the player will advance to the next round. Simple, right?
